title: Verify Neumorphic Design System UI Elements
description: Check that all neumorphic components including cards, buttons, and inputs render correctly with the expected shadows and 3D effects in both light and dark modes.

steps.description: Navigate to pages containing neumorphic components (cards, buttons, inputs).
Verify that all neumorphic components display correct shadow effects and 3D styles.
Toggle dark mode on and off.
Verify neumorphic styles adapt correctly to dark mode with consistent visual aesthetics.

title: Dark Mode Toggle Persistence
description: Ensure that the dark mode toggle switches theme and persists user preference across browser sessions and page reloads.

steps.description: Toggle the dark mode on.
Verify that the UI switches to dark theme with adapted neumorphic styles.
Reload the page or close and reopen the browser.
Verify that dark mode remains enabled and applied to the UI.
Toggle the dark mode off and verify similar persistence on reload.

title: Responsive Navigation Functionality
description: Validate that the collapsible sidebar, hamburger menu, and dynamic React Router routes work correctly across different viewport sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop viewport (>1024px) and verify the sidebar is visible.
The sidebar should be expanded with visible module names and icons.
Collapse the sidebar and verify it reduces to icons only.
Sidebar should toggle between expanded and collapsed states.
Resize the viewport to tablet and mobile sizes (<768px).
Sidebar should be hidden and accessible via hamburger menu.
Click hamburger menu to open navigation.
Menu should slide or drop down with accessible navigation options.
Navigate through various modules via the navigation menu.
Verify routes change correctly and corresponding content is loaded without page reload.

title: Advanced Multi-tab Form Functionality and Validation
description: Verify multi-tab forms for medical, patient, and financial data allow input, tab switching, data persistence, and show correct validation messages.

steps.description: Open a multi-tab form from a module containing medical or patient data.
Verify all expected tabs are visible and accessible.
Input valid data into required fields on the first tab.
Switch to second tab without saving.
Inputted data on the first tab should persist without loss.
Input invalid or missing data in required fields.
Attempt to submit the form.
Appropriate validation error messages should be displayed for each invalid field.
Correct the errors and submit the form.
Form submission should succeed and data saved appropriately.

title: Performance Benchmarks for Page Load and Lazy Loading
description: Confirm that main pages and critical modules load under 2 seconds on typical network conditions and lazy loading of sub-modules works correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to main pages like Welcome, Dashboard, and Settings.
Verify page content is fully rendered within 2 seconds on average internet speed.
Open modules with multiple sub-modules and verify lazy loading behavior.
Verify that sub-modules load only when required upon navigation and do not block main UI.

title: Accessibility Compliance for Keyboard Navigation and Contrast
description: Ensure the application is fully accessible according to standards, supporting keyboard-only navigation and adequate color contrast in all themes.

steps.description: Navigate through the UI using keyboard tab, shift+tab and arrow keys.
Verify all interactive elements including menus, buttons, forms, and links are reachable and operable via keyboard.
Enable screen reader mode and explore page content.
Verify all UI elements have proper ARIA labels and readable descriptions.
Test color contrast of text and interactive elements in both light and dark modes.
Contrast ratios meet or exceed WCAG AA standards.

title: Centralized API Gateway Functionality and React Hooks Integration
description: Verify that the API Gateway exposes all 19 configured endpoints and React hooks correctly fetch and handle backend data including error scenarios.

steps.description: Invoke each API endpoint via the provided React hooks.
Verify successful data retrieval and correct data structure is returned.
Simulate API error responses such as 400, 404, 500.
Verify hooks handle errors gracefully and propagate error states to UI components.
Check that API calls are documented and conform to specification.
API documentation matches actual parameters and responses.

title: Error Boundaries Handling and User Feedback
description: Validate that unexpected UI errors in various modules are caught by error boundaries and user-friendly messages or fallback UIs are displayed.

steps.description: Inject runtime errors or simulate exceptions in UI components during interaction.
Verify error boundaries capture errors without crashing the entire app.
User-friendly fallback UIs or messages are displayed explaining the issue.
Reload or navigate away to verify app recovers normally.

title: Dashboard KPI Cards and Data Visualization Accuracy
description: Ensure dashboards display up-to-date and accurate KPIs using neumorphic styled cards and Recharts visualizations with real-time data updates.

steps.description: Load the Dashboard page.
Verify all KPI cards display correct metric values as per backend data.
Recharts visualizations render correctly with appropriate scales, legends, and data points.
Simulate data updates from backend in real-time.
Verify dashboard updates dynamically to reflect new data without page reload.

title: Module and Sub-module Navigation Completeness
description: Verify full accessibility and functional navigation for all 29 main modules and 100+ sub-modules ensuring each is reachable and displays expected content.

steps.description: Navigate through the sidebar and top navigation menus.
Verify that all 29 main modules are listed and accessible.
For each main module, navigate to all sub-modules accessible.
Verify that sub-module pages load correct data and UI components.
No broken links or navigation errors occur.

title: Theme Persistence and Design Token Consistency
description: Ensure usage of design tokens imported from Figma maintain color, typography, spacing, and shadow consistency across the application with respect to active theme.

steps.description: Inspect visual elements across multiple pages in both light and dark theme.
Verify colors, fonts, spacing, radius, and shadows align with design tokens specified.
Modify theme toggle multiple times.
Verify design tokens adapt consistently without UI glitches.
